subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs recalled outfielder Matt Murton from Class AAA Iowa and optioned infielder Eric Patterson to the same club. Murton has spent all or part of the last three seasons with the Cubs, batting .296 with 28 homers and 98 runs batted in in 289 games. Patterson was recalled from Iowa on Wednesday after Alfonso Soriano was placed on the disabled list. He appeared in three games, going 0 for 6 with an R.B.I. and a stolen base.
